snippet: Thirteen years after her debut novel, "Last Things," was released, Jenny Offill is returning with a two-book deal with Vintage, a division of Random House.
abstract: Thirteen years after her debut novel, "Last Things," was released, Jenny Offill is returning with a two-book deal with Vintage, a division of Random House.

headline.main: Book Deal for Author Ends Circuitous Path Back to Mainstream
headline.print_headline: Book Deal for Author Ends Circuitous Path Back to Mainstream
